sourcesContent:
import dateNormalization from "../utils/functions" const Item = ({movie}) => { return(

{movie.name ? `${movie.name} (${movie.original_name})`: `${movie.title} (${movie.original_title})` }

{movie.first_air_date ? dateNormalization(movie.first_air_date) : dateNormalization(movie.release_date)}

{movie.vote_average}%

) } export default Item
